item.title: Dentist suggestions on Quit Smoking & Breathe Healthy
item.description: We have heard many times that smoking causes cancer. Smoking kills! but how? Let's know about facts about smoking and it's harmful causes to our body. Each one cigarette contains nicotine (the main ingredient) and more than 5000 chemical compounds of which many are cancerous. The nicotine gets you addicted to smoking as every time you smoke a cigarette, you get a go
item.dc:creator: Jyothi S N
